title: Ironbelly Middle Eastern Prop Pack #1
description: AAA quality Middle Eastern props including wood, fuel tank, tires and more in 2K-4K textures.
longDescription: The Ironbelly Middle Eastern Prop Pack includes props and materials that will bring your project to life. Featuring clay pots, a fuel tank, gas can, lamp and other sundries, this pack is suited for any project but was made with a middle eastern, Mediterranean environment in mind. With stunning 2k-4k PBR textures and multiple LODs, this prop pack is a valuable addition to your project.
technicalDetails:
28 AAA Quality Prop Meshes

• Clay Pot 1 (2,504 Tris / 1,433 Verts)

• Clay Pot 2 (1,920 Tris / 1,153 Verts)

• Clay Pot 3 (2,368 Tris / 1,343 Verts)

• Drum 1 (4,788 Tris / 3,076 Verts)

• Drum 2 (4,180 Tris / 2,624 Verts)

• Fuel Tank (4,174 Tris / 4,508 Verts)

• Gas Can (2,590 Tris / 1,587 Verts)

• Lamp 1 (4,779 Tris / 2,873 Verts)

• Lamp 2 (5,478 Tris / 5,120 Verts)

• Lamp 3 (3,452 Tris / 3,056 Verts)

• Metal Bucket 1 (2,360 Tris / 1,394 Verts)

• Metal Bucket 2 (1,554 Tris / 1,115 Verts)

• Oriental Rug 1 (14 Tris / 15 Verts)

• Oriental Rug 2 (12 Tris / 13 Verts)

• Oriental Rug 3 (776 Tris / 643 Verts)

• Sandbag (1,316 Tris / 769 Verts)

• Sandbag Pile (4,789 Tris / 2,804 Verts)

• Tire 1 (3,888 Tris / 2,044 Verts)

• Tire 2 (5,008 Tris / 3,283 Verts)

• Tire 3 (5,504 Tris / 3,500 Verts)

• Wicker Basket 1 (2,582 Tris / 1,583 Verts)

• Wicker Basket 2 (3,776 Tris / 2,210 Verts)

• Wicker Basket 3 (5,412 Tris / 2,903 Verts)

• Wooden Bench (876 Tris / 2,069 Verts)

• Wooden Crate 1 (392 Tris / 396 Verts)

• Wooden Crate 2 (1,072 Tris / 852 Verts)

• Wooden Pallet 1 (2,866 Tris / 1,778 Verts)

• Wooden Pallet 2 (2,516 Tris / 1,620 Verts)


75 LODs (1-3 LODs for each Prop)


86 PBR Textures for all Props (2048x2048 / 4096x4096)

• Base Color

• Normal

• Roughness

• Metallic

• Ambient Occlusion
